mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, name, email, phone, age, job, fname, oname) values(#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{email},#{phone},#{age},#{job},#{fname},#{oname})
mapper.select: select id from member where id=#{id}
select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, age=#{age}, job=#{job}, fname=#{fname}, oname=#{oname} where id=#{id}
